txt.en: 'Gadda was right to trust you. I will remain here and keep an eye on this place. Take what you have found back down to the farm and show Gadda, for he will be very interested.'
'Ah! How interesting. This does not bode well at all, for you have found a great deal more dire evidence than I expected.'
'I do not like any of this. You should take those items to Gadda at once!'
You discovered several important pieces of evidence of the treachery occuring in Stangard.
Gadda is at the abandoned farm near the Eorlsmead Tower.\n\nYou should bring the evidence you found to Gadda.
